Articles.Content: The land at/teleport cheat option introduced in 1.9 seems to make any craft I use in 1.9 when teleported explode due to overheating (from re-entry effects). This only happen when teleporting from orbit. I like the new cheat option as it helps test new craft. I have re-entry heat damage difficulty setting enabled and part pressure and g-force damage enabled.

5 hours ago, Aniruddh said:

The land at/teleport cheat option introduced in 1.9 seems to make any craft I use in 1.9 when teleported explode due to overheating (from re-entry effects). This only happen when teleporting from orbit. I like the new cheat option as it helps test new craft. I have re-entry heat damage difficulty setting enabled and part pressure and g-force damage enabled.

Have you enabled the no-reentry damage option in the cheat menu? I don't have 1.9 yet so I can't be sure.

I tried that just now but it only partially helps, parts still seem to break due to excessive aero forces, unbreakable joints solves the other problem but only seems to work half the time. I would like it if the game somehow automatically disabled physics on the vessel during the teleport.
Hyper edit had that exact problem.
